lead_paragraph: The College World Series will be played in Omaha at least through 2030, under an agreement reached by the city and the N.C.A.A. A long-term contract had been in the works for months, with much of the discussion centered on the construction of a new downtown ballpark to replace 60-year-old Rosenblatt Stadium. The Division I baseball championship has been held in Omaha every year since 1950. Omaha’s strong support for the event is a point of civic pride.
